Title: Establishes safety measures for hoisting
Summary: Establishes safety measures for hoisting; requires the commissioner of labor to promulgate rules and regulations pertaining to safety every ten years.
LawCode: Add ยง256, amd ยง27, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing safety measures for hoisting and requiring the commissioner of labor to promulgate rules and regulations pertaining to safety every ten years
